# Extend Shifting (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, shifter

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Races of Eberron (WotC), pg. 185

When you cast this spell while shifting, you magically extend the duration of that use of your shifting ability by 4 rounds. When that use of your shifting ends, you become [[Fatigued|fatigued]] for 10 minutes. If you are already [[Fatigued|fatigued]], or if another effect causes you to become [[Fatigued|fatigued]] during this time, you become [[Exhausted|exhausted]].
